title: We the Lord Lieutenant and Council, do order, command and proclaim publick humiliation, fasting and prayers to be observed in all the parts and parishes within this kingdom, that is to say, in the city of Dublin and suburbs thereof on Wednesday the twentieth day of this moneth of June, and on Wednesday the seven and twentieth day of the said moneth, in and throughout the whole kingdom ... by the Lord Lieutenant and Council, Ormonde.
author: Ireland. Lord Lieutenant (1661-1669 : Ormonde)
